titles.title: For the relief of Saeed Ghasemimehr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 9/29/1994--Introduced. Declares a named individual eligible for an immigrant visa, or adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence, upon filing an application for such visa.
